name: New Addiction Solitaire
description:
An addictive solitaire game!
The objective of the game is to arrange the cards into four rows so that the cards in each row are of the same suit and sorted in ascending order (from 2 to King).

A card may be moved to a blank space if it is of the same suit, and one rank higher than the card to the left of the space. A blank space in the leftmost position can only be filled with a two).

If you get stuck, use the reshuffle button on shuffle all the cards that are not in the correct position. The game automatically ends when no more moves
are possible
